translations: 压塞机；塞瓶塞的人；出色的人

sentences.sentence: "I had hoped for more," said Corker.
sentences.translation: 考克说：“我本来是抱有更大希望的。”

sentences.sentence: Corker dares to point out what everybody knows but nobody will say.
sentences.translation: 考克大胆挑明了每个人都知道但没人愿意说出来的东西。

sentences.sentence: Republican Senator Bob Corker of Tennessee is an ardent opponent of tax hikes.
sentences.translation: 来自田纳西州的共和党参议员鲍伯。考克激烈反对增税。
